name: restic 0.3.1
body:
# Introduction

We're proud to present restic version 0.3.1. This release is a bugfix release. For details, please see the changelog below.

# Change Log

## [v0.3.1](https://github.com/restic/restic/tree/v0.3.1) (2016-12-13)

[Full Changelog](https://github.com/restic/restic/compare/v0.3.0...v0.3.1)

**Implemented enhancements:**
- Clearing page cache on client machines [#666](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/666)
- Update poly1305 [#639](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/639)
- Optimization for Linux: Figure out if using posix_fadvise and posix_fallocate work [#117](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/117)

**Fixed bugs:**
- "error <f> has changed", still ends in "0 errors" [#696](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/696)
- Files not backed up at all [#689](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/689)
- Snapshot commited while backup data is incomplete [#686](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/686)
- create key in backend at "any local dir" failed: Calibrate: scrypt.Calibrate: scrypt: the parameters provided are invalid [#676](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/676)
- `backup` ignores hostname when choosing parent snapshot [#674](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/674)
- connect: no buffer space available [#642](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/642)
- panic: close of closed channel in restic/repository test [#605](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/605)
- Nil blob list errors, zeroed files in backup [#604](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/604)
- Directory metadata is not restored for existing directories [#564](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/564)

**Closed issues:**
- Can't compile with go1.8beta1 [#680](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/680)
- Omit snapshot creation if there was no change [#662](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/662)
- Inadequate build system [#660](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/660)
- no ID found / type not specified [#640](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/640)
- Do not output to terminal, if 'bg' [#381](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/381)
- Find file system boundaries [#47](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/47)

**Merged pull requests:**
- Correctly save modified files [#691](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/691) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Even if file changes size during backup, still save it [#690](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/690) ([zcalusic](https://github.com/zcalusic))
- Save snapshot after saving all pack files [#688](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/688) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Update debug message [#685](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/685) ([jannic](https://github.com/jannic))
- Omit "archived as %v" messages in quiet mode. [#683](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/683) ([jannic](https://github.com/jannic))
- Small typo in dry-run of remove snapshot [#682](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/682) ([jpmens](https://github.com/jpmens))
- Stop trying to detect Go version [#681](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/681) ([zcalusic](https://github.com/zcalusic))
- Update github.com/elithrar/simple-scrypt [#678](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/678) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Use the hostname filter to find a parent snasphot [#675](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/675) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Don't consider a pre-existing directory in the restore path to be a failure [#673](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/673) ([Novex](https://github.com/Novex))
- Remove fadvise [#670](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/670) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Fix REST backend HTTP keepalive [#669](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/669) ([zcalusic](https://github.com/zcalusic))
- fs.DeviceID(): Return errors whehn fi is nil [#659](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/659) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Read files to backup from a file [#657](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/657) ([AlexanderThaller](https://github.com/AlexanderThaller))
- Remove redundant check of error var e [#651](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/651) ([justinclift](https://github.com/justinclift))
- forget: do not load index [#650](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/650) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- don't print status info when running in the background [#646](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/646) ([stakewinner00](https://github.com/stakewinner00))
- Update golang.org/x/crypto/poly1305 [#643](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/643) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Improve error message for 'forget' [#641](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/641) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Added long paths fix for samba network shares [#638](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/638) ([hmsdao](https://github.com/hmsdao))

name: restic 0.3.0
body:
# Introduction

After two months development we're proud to release restic version 0.3.0. The most notable change is the addition of the `prune` and `forget` commands which allow removing backups from the repository according to configurable criteria.

As always, thanks for reporting any issues you encounter!

# Change Log

## [v0.3.0](https://github.com/restic/restic/tree/v0.3.0) (2016-10-02)

[Full Changelog](https://github.com/restic/restic/compare/v0.2.0...v0.3.0)

**Implemented enhancements:**
- Display amount of data deleted after prune [#581](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/581)
- Handle "disk is full" gracefully [#540](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/540)
- restic should respect GOMAXPROCS env var [#535](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/535)
- Better error logging for s3 [#388](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/388)
- Add command line option to read password from a file [#278](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/278)
- Optimization for Linux: Use openat() and opendirat() [#98](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/98)
- Write manpage [#31](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/31)

**Fixed bugs:**
- panic: shorthand redefinition on restic restore [#633](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/633)
- Duplicate snapshots shown in FUSE mount [#624](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/624)
- Invalid -r value causes explosion [#622](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/622)
- kernel is oom-ing on first backup [#612](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/612)
- Multiple test failures with stack traces [#606](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/606)
- Panic during prune command to minio S3 repo [#603](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/603)
- restic reads too much data from the repository for an incremental backup [#582](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/582)
- Panic when trying to create backup [#574](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/574)
- sftp backend fails in path, if used from Windows [#568](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/568)
- Memory leak when backing up over http2 to minio behind Nginx [#565](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/565)
- restic check report errors after 1st backup [#546](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/546)
- Too many open files [#544](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/544)
- restic crash when backing up [#529](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/529)
- "pack not referenced in any index" after rebuild-index [#435](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/435)
- Restore from Backup in windows [#360](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/360)
- restic optimize does not delete unreferenced packs [#359](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/359)
- restic cannot handle Windows paths [#339](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/339)
- wrong Windows drive handling [#333](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/333)
- restic init password interaction fail on MSYS2 Windows bash [#330](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/330)
- Browsing in fuse mounted snapshot gives input/output error [#313](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/313)
- Extend the consistency and integrity check to the pack files [#258](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/258)

**Closed issues:**
- No bug, just feedback [#634](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/634)
- panic in packet_write_wait when sftp connection terminated [#629](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/629)
- x [#617](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/617)
- restic scan is returning unexpectedly large result [#610](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/610)
- Cannot find a blob listed in "list blobs" [#590](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/590)
- id not found after prune [#589](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/589)
- Restore can fail for multiple directories in same snapshot [#588](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/588)
- sftp URL parsing bug [#587](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/587)
- Failure to remove broken packs < 2048 bytes [#586](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/586)
- User Interface: Snapshot Expire Options? [#572](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/572)
- Backup also files on windows with longer pathnames than 255 chars (e.g. from node). [#567](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/567)
- Restore hard links on *nix [#566](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/566)
- Key-value labelling support for snapshots [#557](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/557)
- Release strategy [#556](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/556)
- Add 'prune' command [#479](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/479)
- Add --exclude-other-filesystem support [#370](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/370)
- Refactor backend tests [#346](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/346)
- Introduce GPG-signed releases and commits [#134](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/134)
- Cleanup documentation [#124](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/124)
- Write documentation for reporting bugs [#110](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/110)
- Add error reporting facility [#109](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/109)
- Document Use Cases [#94](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/94)
- Implement "optimize repository" command [#92](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/92)
- restic check: improve output / output recommendation [#74](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/74)
- implement progress bar for: restic fsck --check-data [#73](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/73)
- error message should be more precise [#70](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/70)
- Add tags to snapshots [#55](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/55)
- Implement function to delete old snapshots according to a retention policy. [#51](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/51)
- Implement HTTP Server/Client and backend [#23](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/23)
- Delete Specific Snapshot [#18](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/18)
- Select scrypt parameter based on computing power and memory [#17](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/17)

**Merged pull requests:**
- Fix short-hand option clash [#635](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/635) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Rework debug message printing [#632](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/632) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Switch to cobra/pflag for CLI [#631](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/631) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Remove unused bits and pieces [#630](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/630) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- fuse: fix tests for snapshots with same timestamps [#627](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/627) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Add "-x", "--one-file-system" option [#626](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/626) ([rfjakob](https://github.com/rfjakob))
- fuse: correctly handle snapshots [#625](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/625) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Improve error messages for open repo [#623](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/623) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Add verbose error when marshalling a node fails [#620](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/620) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Update all vendored dependencies [#619](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/619) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Cleanup CI tests for fuse [#618](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/618) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Add tags to snapshots [#616](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/616) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- doc/Manual: Update usage help listing [#615](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/615) ([kerel-fs](https://github.com/kerel-fs))
- Improve statistics for `prune` [#614](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/614) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Read password from file [#613](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/613) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Fix a small typo in `stdin` example [#608](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/608) ([rosetree](https://github.com/rosetree))
- Update chunker [#602](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/602) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Add codecov.io [#601](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/601) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- WIP: restructure code [#600](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/600) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Replace lowlevel syscall to restore symlink times [#599](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/599) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Update minio-go [#598](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/598) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Fix panic for debug.Log() with empty string [#597](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/597) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Fix the cat command [#595](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/595) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Remove check for filemode 0 [#594](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/594) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- local/sftp: Fix broken error handling [#593](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/593) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Fix panic when parsing sftp URIs [#592](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/592) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- On prune report, packs instead of files + fix counter [#591](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/591) ([viric](https://github.com/viric))
- show progress every second when run non interactively [#585](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/585) ([trbs](https://github.com/trbs))
- Add more safety checks for Unpacker [#584](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/584) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Fix progress output on Windows [#583](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/583) ([stuertz](https://github.com/stuertz))
- Change errors library [#580](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/580) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Properly close connections to s3 backend on Stat() [#579](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/579) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Fix build on linux/arm [#578](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/578) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Dynamically calibrate scrypt parameters [#577](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/577) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Improve documentation, add explanation and weekly [#576](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/576) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Remove POSIX constants, reduce code duplication [#575](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/575) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Fix osxfuse on Travis/darwin [#573](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/573) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Require Go 1.6 or greater [#571](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/571) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Fix 567 [#570](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/570) ([stuertz](https://github.com/stuertz))
- Use the platform-independent function for joining [#569](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/569) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Invert go version test for ldflags [#563](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/563) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Issue-535: restic respect GOMAXPROCS env variable depending on go version [#562](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/562) ([damekr](https://github.com/damekr))
- Fix the debug environment variable name in the manual [#559](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/559) ([vrischmann](https://github.com/vrischmann))
- Detect a devel version correctly in LDFlags() [#558](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/558) ([vrischmann](https://github.com/vrischmann))
- Implement prune [#518](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/518) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))

name: restic 0.2.0
body:
This is the second public release of restic.

## [v0.2.0](https://github.com/restic/restic/tree/v0.2.0) (2016-07-30)

[Full Changelog](https://github.com/restic/restic/compare/v0.1.0-doc...v0.2.0)

**Implemented enhancements:**
- Allow reading exclude patterns from a file [#416](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/416)
- Archiver: Use directio to avoid caching data [#401](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/401)

**Fixed bugs:**
- Building fails: import cycle not allowed [#534](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/534)
- restic -r check / error for tree [#528](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/528)
- minio update broke compatibility with Google Cloud Storage [#520](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/520)
- building restic on raspbian jessie with golang 1.3.3 fails [#501](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/501)
- --exclude seems confused by leading & trailing slashes [#499](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/499)
- minor: `gb test` leaves temporary `mount` behind [#494](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/494)
- restic backup into existing repository fails with error "encoding/hex: invalid byte: U+002E '.'" [#474](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/474)
- Repository broken after optimize [#434](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/434)

**Closed issues:**
- Backend: Amazon Glacier [#541](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/541)
- Error during first backup [#538](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/538)
- AWS Access Keys [#521](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/521)
- Feature Request: Storage Backend "Amazon Cloud Drive" [#508](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/508)
- sftp on windows [#505](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/505)
- syncany could be a good inspiration software: plugins! [#492](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/492)
- Compilation on Fedora 23 fails [#491](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/491)
- Ignore index files with invalid names [#475](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/475)
- documentation: integrate manual into main repo [#452](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/452)
- Feature: Backup data read from stdin [#255](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/255)
- Add documentation to explain terminology [#42](https://github.com/restic/restic/issues/42)

**Merged pull requests:**
- Fix fuse panic with empty files [#554](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/554) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Update minio-go [#553](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/553) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Explicitly Close() obj after ReadFull() [#552](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/552) ([benagricola](https://github.com/benagricola))
- idset.go: micro-optimise away redundant scan [#548](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/548) ([mappu](https://github.com/mappu))
- Don't report valid types as invalid [#545](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/545) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Updates for build.go [#543](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/543) ([mappu](https://github.com/mappu))
- Fix typo in Manual.md [#537](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/537) ([xet7](https://github.com/xet7))
- Update minio-go [#531](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/531) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Added Minio.io configuration steps to run as backend for restic. [#525](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/525) ([koolhead17](https://github.com/koolhead17))
- Fix flaky worker cancel test [#516](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/516) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Traverse paths in the same order as parent snapshot [#515](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/515) ([viric](https://github.com/viric))
- Better backup parent snapshot search. Part of #513 [#514](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/514) ([viric](https://github.com/viric))
- Cleanups and test functions [#511](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/511) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Allow reading data from stdin [#509](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/509) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Update minio-go [#507](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/507) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Add option to restore latest snapshot with optional path and source filters [#503](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/503) ([gerdus](https://github.com/gerdus))
- Update crypto library [#502](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/502) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Fix exclude filters with trailing slash [#500](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/500) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Fix CI tests [#498](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/498) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))

- add debian stable help [#489](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/489) ([xmaka](https://github.com/xmaka))

- rest backend: Remove indirection on http.Client [#477](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/477) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Ignore invalid index files [#476](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/476) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Fix coveralls.io service [#473](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/473) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Update chunker [#472](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/472) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Refactor src/restic/cmd to src/cmds [#471](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/471) ([fawick](https://github.com/fawick))
- Added missing handle to the s3.Stat log message output [#468](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/468) ([ckemper67](https://github.com/ckemper67))
- Merging restic-server [#467](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/467) ([fawick](https://github.com/fawick))
- Add REST backend [#464](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/464) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- doc: Reduce text in README, add to Manual [#462](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/462) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))
- Debug issue #434 [#459](https://github.com/restic/restic/pull/459) ([fd0](https://github.com/fd0))

name: restic 0.1.0
body: This is the first public release of restic.
